author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police are in the process of identifying the body of a woman that was found in a charred state at Chinna Tirupathi here on Tuesday. The woman said to be around 30 years was found with face thrashed.

Kerosene odour emanated from the body and a soft drink beverage bottle was also found near the body. The body was kept at Salem Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital.
title: Body yet to be identified
